profileAlternative.name: Teppo Pera
profileAlternative.headline: Python Developer at Noble
profileAlternative.summary: I'm a software developer with various skills in my toolbox. My favorite language by far is Python, although I have wide experience in other languages too, such as C++ and JavaScript being the strongest ones. Still, I consider programming language to be just one tool to accomplish functional software. In fact, I believe that programming skill is not limited just to languages, but also how to use them and how to use the skills learned in other language and use those same skills in the other. That's why we have test-driven development, frameworks, design patterns and other concepts, that can be mixed together so that we can build a working software. I want to use those tools and concepts to build a software that matters to its users. Quality comes first.

positions.title: Python Developer as contractor
positions.description:
Participated development of MiFID2, which is a transaction reporting and post-trade transparency platform. It was developed using high availability microservices with Python as the main language. It included receiving trades from multiple sources, processing trades and deciding which trades were going to be reported. All this was and had to be done in few seconds. Testing was done using lettuce BDD framework and python unit tests. Additionally, developed web applications using Scala, JavaScript, AngularJS and Webpack 2.

positions.title: SDE II
positions.description:
Participating in development of web applications using web technologies for frontend such as JavaScript, AngularJS, JQuery and for backend such as Python 3, Django and Django REST API, which work on Microsoft SQL. Main concept for UI development was MVVM pattern, which enabled rapid prototyping and development of UI.

Testing is done using Protractor (All major browsers and PhantomJS) and Jasmine for JavaScript and for Python its own unit test framework and Fresher.
The development is done to multiple separated systems where communication happens over REST APIs.

Along with development work, also participated on supporting new Scrum Master to get into the role, lead development of major features and documented functionality of huge system. Additionally developed multiple working prototypes to support decision making which eventually were productized into system.

positions.title: Nokia
positions.description:
This role continued the work in same environment as described in previous role, with following additions.

During this period, mainly worked as full-time Scrum Master, or to be more specific, Kanban Master in a major web application project. The work involved of defining the workflow for single team, motivating people to follow that workflow, measuring metrics (Trac) and improving workflow based on the metric. Major highlights for process renewal were: Changes to Git branching practices, review practices, developer responsibilities, individual coaching, etc. General goal was to take development closer to Behavior Driven Development (BDD).

Completed Sertified Scrum Master and Agile Coaching and Leadership courses.

Designed and implemented a major UI feature with testability as prioirity one feature. As a result, that feature turned out to close to bug free solution thanks to design that enabled to cover most of the code with tests. Used techonologies were ExtJS, CoffeeScript, Jasmine and CucumberJS.

Influenced highly on techonology choices, architecture and design of new Python based system service where high performance was the most important factor. Techonologies used were Python 2, Twisted, Celery, Memcached, Django and MySQL
